subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The former champion Luis León Sánchez beat the veteran Jens Voigt in a sprint finish to win the sixth stage of the Paris-Nice race, while Bradley Wiggins kept his six-second overall lead with two stages remaining.
snippet: The former champion Luis León Sánchez beat the veteran Jens Voigt in a sprint finish to win the sixth stage of the Paris-Nice race, while Bradley Wiggins kept his six-second overall lead with two stages remaining.
